quotes.quote: The secret to creativity is knowing how to hide your sources.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Frugality without creativity is deprivation.
quotes.author: Amy Dacyczyn

quotes.quote: So you see, imagination needs moodling - long, inefficient, happy idling, dawdling and puttering.
quotes.author: Brenda Ueland

quotes.quote: The creation of something new is not accomplished by the intellect but by the play instinct acting from inner necessity. The creative mind plays with the objects it loves.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Creativity is a drug I cannot live without.
quotes.author: Cecil B. DeMille

quotes.quote: The problem is never how to get new, innovative thoughts into your mind, but how to get old ones out. Every mind is a building filled with archaic furniture. Clean out a corner of your mind and creativity will instantly fill it.
quotes.author: Dee Hock

quotes.quote: There were always people like the pope. They serve a certain function, of course. They subsidize us. But, they don't create anything and they must never be allowed to stop the artist from creating.
quotes.author: Diane Frolov and Andrew Schneider

quotes.quote: Humanity can be quite cold to those whose eyes see the world differently.
quotes.author: Eric A. Burns

quotes.quote:
Observe Everything.
Communicate Well.
Draw, Draw, Draw.
quotes.author: Frank Thomas

quotes.quote: Creativity can solve almost any problem. The creative act, the defeat of habit by originality, overcomes everything.
quotes.author: George Lois

quotes.quote: When Alexander the Great visited Diogenes and asked whether he could do anything for the famed teacher, Diogenes replied: 'Only stand out of my light.' Perhaps some day we shall know how to heighten creativity. Until then, one of the best things we can do for creative men and women is to stand out of their light.
quotes.author: John W. Gardner

quotes.quote: To live a creative life, we must lose our fear of being wrong.
quotes.author: Joseph Chilton Pearce

quotes.quote: Creativity is...seeing something that doesn't exist already. You need to find out how you can bring it into being and that way be a playmate with God.
quotes.author: Michele Shea

quotes.quote: Creativity represents a miraculous coming together of the uninhibited energy of the child with its apparent opposite and enemy, the sense of order imposed on the disciplined adult intelligence.
quotes.author: Norman Podhoretz

quotes.quote: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: I started concentrating so hard on my vision that I lost sight.
quotes.author: Robin Green

quotes.quote: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: Every time we say, "Let there be!" in any form, something happens.
quotes.author: Stella Terrill Mann

quotes.quote: Creative work is play. It is free speculation using materials of one's chosen form.
quotes.author: Stephen Nachmanovitch

quotes.quote: The most potent muse of all is our own inner child.
quotes.author: Stephen Nachmanovitch

quotes.quote: The noun of self becomes a verb. This flashpoint of creation in the present moment is where work and play merge.
quotes.author: Stephen Nachmanovitch
